member.name: P:QuickLibrary.Common.IsApplicationRunning
member.summary: This will tell if application is runnin. Currently needed in frmMaster because code is running when we load form in design mode and generates error.

member.summary: This is used to set the cell type for quantity columns.

member.summary: It counts character occurence in the given string.

member.name: M:QuickLibrary.Common.IndexOfStringAtOccurence(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Searches given string and finds particular occurence of the string to search.

member.name: M:QuickLibrary.Common.GenerateNextDocumentNo(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Give it the last document number (can be nothing) and the document format and it will give you the next document number. ReturnLikeOperatorPattern should be true if you want a string which you need to get the maximum document no in the database, when getting next document no it should be false. Y will give you the year, possible patterns are Y, YY, YYY, YYYY. 9 will give you the increamenting digit, there any repitions 1-n. P will give you the party category code. p will give you the party code.

member.name: M:QuickLibrary.Common.GetDocumentNoSegment(QuickLibrary.Common.DocumentNoSegments,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get particular segment from the Document Number. Usually it is used to check if static segment is changed such as party category code then maybe document number will be generated new.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:QuickLibrary.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
